name: part_000
file: tmp_【#ときのそら５周年記念】想いをこめて届ける3D配信！ [TjGC7Jzc5ns]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening intro and countdown for the 5th anniversary concert.
Toki no Sora performs 'HOT LIMIT' on stage with Ankimo dancing along.
MC section where Sora greets the audience and mentions Ankimo's dancing.
Sora continues the performance of 'HOT LIMIT'.

subtitles.original: HOT LIMIT
subtitles.english: HOT LIMIT

subtitles.original: 妖精たちが 夏を刺激する
subtitles.english: Fairies are stimulating the summer

subtitles.original: 生足 魅惑の マーメイド
subtitles.english: Bare legs, a captivating mermaid

subtitles.original: 出すとこ出して たわわになったら
subtitles.english: Showing what should be shown, and when it's ripened

subtitles.original: 本物の恋は やれ 爽快っ
subtitles.english: A real love is, oh, so refreshing!

subtitles.original: ごまかしきかない 薄着の曲線は
subtitles.english: Can't hide them, the curves in light clothing

subtitles.original: 確信犯の しなやかな STYLE
subtitles.english: A deliberate, supple STYLE

subtitles.original: 耐水性の 気持ちに切り替わる
subtitles.english: Switching to a water-resistant feeling

subtitles.original: 瞬間の眩しさは いかがなもの
subtitles.english: How about the dazzling brilliance of the moment?

subtitles.original: ココロまで脱がされる
subtitles.english: Being stripped down to the heart

subtitles.original: 熱い風の誘惑に
subtitles.english: By the temptation of the hot wind

subtitles.original: 負けちゃって構わないから
subtitles.english: It's okay to lose to it, because

subtitles.original: 真夏は 不祥事も キミ次第で
subtitles.english: In midsummer, even scandals depend on you

subtitles.original: 妖精たちが 夏を刺激する
subtitles.english: Fairies are stimulating the summer

subtitles.original: 生足 魅惑の マーメイド
subtitles.english: Bare legs, a captivating mermaid

subtitles.original: 出すとこ出して たわわになったら
subtitles.english: Showing what should be shown, and when it's ripened

subtitles.original: 本物の恋が でき爽快っ
subtitles.english: A real love is formed, so refreshing!

subtitles.original: キミじゃなくても バテキミにもなるよ
subtitles.english: Even if it's not you, I'll get exhausted too

subtitles.original: 暑いばかりの 街は憂鬱で
subtitles.english: The city that's only hot is depressing

subtitles.original: スキを見せたら 不意に耳に入る
subtitles.english: If I show a gap, I suddenly hear

subtitles.original: 寒いギャグなんかで 涼みたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to cool down with some bad joke

subtitles.original: むせ返る 熱帯夜を
subtitles.english: A sweltering tropical night

subtitles.original: 彩る 花火のように
subtitles.english: Like fireworks coloring the sky

subtitles.original: 打ち上げて散る 想いなら
subtitles.english: If these are feelings that shoot up and scatter

subtitles.original: このまま抱き合って 焦がれるまで
subtitles.english: Let's keep hugging like this until we're scorched

subtitles.original: 妖精たちが 夏をしたくなる
subtitles.english: Fairies make me want to do summer

subtitles.original: 熱い欲望は トルネイド
subtitles.english: Hot desires are a TORNADO

subtitles.original: 出すもの出して 素直になりたい
subtitles.english: Letting it all out, I want to be honest

subtitles.original: キミと僕となら IT'S ALL RIGHT
subtitles.english: If it's you and me, IT'S ALL RIGHT

subtitles.original: 皆さん、今日は私の5周年ライブに見に来てくれてありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you so much for coming to see my 5th-anniversary live today!

subtitles.original: なんと、あん肝も一緒に踊ってくれてるよ！
subtitles.english: Look, Ankimo is also dancing along!

subtitles.original: わあー！盛り上がれー！
subtitles.english: Wow! Let's get hyped!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Hai!

subtitles.english: Hai!

subtitles.english: Hai!

subtitles.english: Hai!

subtitles.english: Hai!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Hai!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Hai!

subtitles.original: 爽快の 伸びるの海じゃ
subtitles.english: In the refreshing, stretching sea

subtitles.original: 感じなくなってる キミを
subtitles.english: You, who have stopped feeling

subtitles.original: 冷えたワインの 口づけで
subtitles.english: With the kiss of chilled wine

subtitles.original: 酔わせて 溶かして 差し上げましょう
subtitles.english: I'll let you get drunk and melt you down

subtitles.original: 妖精たちが 夏を刺激する
subtitles.english: Fairies are stimulating the summer

subtitles.original: 生足 へそ出し マーメイド
subtitles.english: Bare legs, midriff-baring mermaid

subtitles.original: 恋に かまけて お留守になるのも
subtitles.english: Being so preoccupied with love that you're absent-minded

subtitles.original: ダイスケ的にも オールオッケー!
subtitles.english: Even for Daisuke, it's all okay!

subtitles.original: 妖精夏を ドレスと したくなる
subtitles.english: Wanting to make the fairy summer into a dress

subtitles.original: 独り寝の夜に YOU CAN SAY GOOD-BYE
subtitles.english: To the nights sleeping alone, YOU CAN SAY GOOD-BYE

subtitles.original: 奥のほうまで 乾く間ないほど
subtitles.english: To the point where there's no time to dry inside

subtitles.original: 本物の恋を しませんか
subtitles.english: Won't you have a real love?
